title: Chromeo tall slender font ID
content:
Anybody know the name of this tall slim font used for "Atrak and Chromeo"? Thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101018072043im_/http:/typophile.com/files/chromeo_4068.jpg)
author: SKUMATIK

comments.content: and it's free! thanks so much!
